### Speakers  
UCSF grad students

SPG fundraised to send 40 UCSF graduate students to DC for the March for Science and hosted sign making events on campus for the San Francisco satellite march. 40 UCSF students joined faculty to visit congressional offices in DC and advocate for increased NIH funding for basic scientific research.
